DOC.brief_summary: This study design investigate effect lersivirine QT/QTc interval order help establish safety profile lersivirine .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Of Lersivirine ( UK-453,061 ) On Qt Intervals In Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female subject age 18 55 year , inclusive , ( Healthy define clinically relevant abnormality identify detailed medical history , full physical examination , include blood pressure pulse rate measurement , normal 12lead ECG clinical laboratory test ) History risk factor QT prolongation torsades de pointes ( eg , organic heart disease , congestive heart failure , hypokalemia , hypomagnesemia , congenital long QT syndrome , myocardial ischemia infarction ) . Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product excess equivalent 5 cigarette per day Use prescription nonprescription drug , vitamin dietary supplement within 7 day 5 halflives ( whichever longer ) prior first dose trial medication .
DOC.keyword: lersivirine QT QTc ECG HIV NNRTI
